info.title: Prediction Market Data API
info.description: Comprehensive API endpoints for querying data from prediction markets supported via workflows.

get.description: Search for markets and events by query string or tags.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string. Use '*' to return all results.

parameters.name: tagIds
parameters.description: Array of tag IDs to filter by (can be repeated)

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: Only return markets currently accepting orders

get.description: Retrieve all available tags for filtering markets.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Zero-based index of first tag to return

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific event, including all associated markets.
Retrieve market information by CLOB token IDs, slugs, or tag ID.

parameters.name: clobTokenIds
parameters.description: Array of CLOB token IDs (can be repeated)

get.description: Retrieve the current best price for a specific token and side (BUY or SELL).

price.description: Current best price for the specified side

get.description: Retrieve historical price data for a specific token over a given time interval.
Retrieve trending markets sorted by 24-hour volume. Markets must have minimum $150K of 24h volume.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.description: Retrieve all current open positions for a specific user.
Retrieve closed positions (resolved markets) for a specific user.
Retrieve trade history for a specific user.
Retrieve comprehensive activity history for a specific user, including orders, trades, and other actions.
Retrieve aggregate profit and loss information across all positions for a specific user.

forceShow.description: Whether to force show this tag

createdBy.description: ID of user who created the tag

updatedBy.description: ID of user who last updated the tag

forceHide.description: Whether to force hide this tag

isCarousel.description: Whether this tag is a carousel tag

submitted_by.description: Address of user who submitted the market

endDateIso.description: ISO date string of end date

startDateIso.description: ISO date string of start date

clobTokenIds.description: JSON string of CLOB token IDs

clearBookOnStart.description: Whether to clear book on start

umaResolutionStatuses.description: JSON string of UMA resolution statuses

negRiskFeeBips.description: Negative risk fee in basis points

events.description: Array of events with associated markets and tags
Array of events with associated markets and tags

side.description: Order side (BUY or SELL for trades, empty for non-trade activities)

currentPositions.description: Total PnL from current open positions

BadRequest.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. Contact Swaps.xyz to obtain an API key.
